CutSceneText.Text: The Arena of Discipline is for one-on-one fights.
Your opponent may be Asmodian or Elyos.
Defeat your opponent to earn points. The first to earn the target number wins.
There will be 3 rounds, and when you resurrect, you won't suffer from Soul Sickness.
If no one reaches the points target, the contestant with more points after 3 rounds will be the winner.
